amendment.description: To facilitate the development of recommendations on interoperability standards to inform and facilitate the exchange of prescription information across State lines.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2145 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2145 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S3555-3557) To facilitate the development of recommendations on interoperability standards to inform and facilitate the exchange of prescription information across State lines.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2145 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Portman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2145 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
